epistemic_pragmatic_balance.output:
Exploring Epistemic vs Pragmatic Balance in Active Inference

======================================================================

Running: Pure Exploration
  Epistemic Weight: 2.0
  Pragmatic Weight: 0.1
  Final Distance: 2.8355
  Mean VFE: 2.2996
  Outputs: output/epistemic_pragmatic_comparison/balance_e2.0_p0.1

Running: Balanced
  Epistemic Weight: 1.0
  Pragmatic Weight: 1.0
  Final Distance: 18.5700
  Mean VFE: 46.1019
  Outputs: output/epistemic_pragmatic_comparison/balance_e1.0_p1.0

Running: Pure Exploitation
  Epistemic Weight: 0.1
  Pragmatic Weight: 2.0
  Final Distance: 28.1537
  Mean VFE: 106.1882
  Outputs: output/epistemic_pragmatic_comparison/balance_e0.1_p2.0

======================================================================
Generating comparative visualizations...

✓ Comparative analysis saved to output/epistemic_pragmatic_comparison/comparison_summary.png

======================================================================
Key Insights:
----------------------------------------------------------------------
• Pure Exploration: Agent explores more but may take longer to reach goal
• Balanced: Agent balances information gain with goal-directed behavior
• Pure Exploitation: Agent focuses on goal but may miss useful information
======================================================================

✓ All experiment outputs in: output/epistemic_pragmatic_comparison
======================================================================
